lines.text: and having writ moves on... and there is no END

[subtitled from Hindi]
It's as though nothing happened. Before one passes it, Time seems to drag. To go on forever. But once it passes, centuries seem moments. Like seeing a dream. Today it's the same me and the same business.

[subtitled from Hindi]
This is nothing father. See how we three brohters turn this into a grand thing. We'll be the best.

[subtitled from Hindi]
No, son. Don't say that. I had once said that, and Time slapped me hard. It scattered my entire family. It has united us all again. Why? To show that Time is everything. Time makes, and Time breaks.

[subtitled from Hindi]
God has changed our days again.

[subtitled from Hindi]
Laxmi, whatever God took from us, he returned with interest. Sons, with daughters-in-law!
[his daughters-in-law come to pay their respects]
Bless you. Bless you, my dear.
